text:
WILLIAM M. BRISH
WILLIAM C. DIEHL
Assistant Superintendent
Superintendent
BOARD OF EDUCATION
OF WASHINGTON COUNTY
Hagerstown, Maryland
January 21, 1957
Mr. Harry Skornia
NAEB Headquarters
Gregory Hall
University of Illinois
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Harry:
Enclosed is some of the information that
was distributed during our two-day open
house this past week. Wednesday was
Educators’ Day, and over IOC visitors were
here to observe the project. On Thursday
nearly 100 representatives of industry
were here. From comments we received, we
are quite happy with the way things are
going.
Needless to say both Anne and I were ex¬
tremely disappointed when we learned you
would not be here. We were expecting to
be able to spend some time with you while
you were here. The welcome mat is still
out, and we hope you will be able to pay us
a visit in the near future.
Sincerely
JBB: j
Enc.
